column4: how can i change the wallpaper of each of my desktops on the compiz cube? i dont know which plugin to use or where to get it :(
ive seen it done, so it has to be
easiest way i can think of is to make a wallpaper that is the size of one of your workspaces x how many you have
ie : one workspace is 1024x768, therefore wallpaper would be (1024x4)wide, 768 high
according to that link, you can do it but i cant find the plugins
have you looked into using the ppa repos for compiz?
i dont know what those are
actually thats a difference plugin...one sec
main ppa repos for compiz instructions here : https://launchpad.net/~compiz/+archive choose hardy from drop down list
or you could risk using this script to experiment with the latest bleeding edge plugins : http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=820802&highlight=compiz+plugins
yeah thanks i want the latest bleeding ones lol
found solution. run script at this forum 4th post down (compizplugins4.sh) http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=820802&highlight=compiz+plugins&page=4
